Source.Name: aria2
Source.Summary: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility.
Source.Description: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. aria2 can be manipulated via built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.

Package.Name: aria2
Package.Summary: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility.
Package.Description: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. aria2 can be manipulated via built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.
